Race.SpecificTitle: Justice of the Peace -- Justice of the Peace Ward G

Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Charter Amendment)
(Section 4-03(b))

Summary:  Amendment to Article IV, to amend Section 4-03(b) to provide for qualifications for the Chief Administrative Officer of St. Bernard Parish Government.
Race.FullText:
Shall Article IV, Section 4-03(b) of the Home Rule Charter of the Parish of St. Bernard, State of Louisiana, be amended to read as follows:
(b) The Chief Administrative Officer at the time of appointment shall have at least a bachelor's degree, with preference for a master's degree, in public administration, business administration, or a related field from an accredited college or university and have at least three (3) years experience operating a multi-tiered corporation with a minimum of 75 employees as a senior level executive?

Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Charter Amendment)
(Section 4-04(b))

Summary:  Amendment to Article IV, to amend Section 4-04(b) to provide for qualifications for the finance director of St. Bernard Parish Government.
Race.FullText:
Shall Article IV, Section 4-04(b) of the Home Rule Charter of the Parish of St. Bernard, State of Louisiana, be amended to read as follows:
(b) The director of finance, at the time of appointment, shall have at least a bachelor's degree in accounting or equivalent degree with twenty-one (21) hours of accounting from an accredited college or university and shall have at least three (3) years experience in governmental accounting, with preference for experience with automated financial systems in a governmental organization with a minimum annual budget of at least fifty percent (50%) of the current operating budget of St. Bernard Parish Government?

Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Charter Amendment)
(Section 4-06 (b) and (c))

Summary:  Amendment to Article IV, to amend Section 4-06 (b) and (c) of the St. Bernard Parish Home Rule Charter to change the qualifications of the director of community development and also change the duties of said department.

Race.SpecificTitle: PW HRCAmd.Art.IVSec.4-08(c) -- PC - Art. IV, Sec. 4-08(c)
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Charter Amendment)
(Section 4-08 (c))

Summary:  Amendment to Article IV, to amend Section 4-08 (c) to provide for the change of duties of the director of parks and recreation.
Race.FullText:
Shall Article IV, Section 4-08 (c) of the Home Rule Charter of the Parish of St. Bernard, State of Louisiana, be amended to read as follows:
Sec. 4-08. Department of parks and recreation
(c) The director of parks and recreation shall direct and be responsible for the following activities:
(1)  Direction and supervision of recreational activities and facilities;
(2)  Other such activities within the scope of this office as may be directed by the president?

Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Charter Amendment)
(Section 4-09)

Summary:  Amendment to Article IV, to amend Section 4-09 to provide for the name change of the department to read "Department of human resources" and also change the qualifications of the director of said department.
Race.FullText:
Shall Article IV, Section 4-09 of the Home Rule Charter of the Parish of St. Bernard, State of Louisiana, be amended to read as follows:  
Sec. 4-09. Department of human resources. 
(a)  The head of the department of human resources shall be the St. Bernard Parish Director of Human Resources (hereinafter referred to as the director of human resources).
(b)  The director of human resources at the time of appointment shall have a bachelor's degree in human resources, public administration, business administration, or a related field from an accredited college or university with a minimum of two (2) years experience in human resources management and benefits administration in government service or in the private sector supervising an employee base of fifty percent (50%) the size of St. Bernard Parish Government?
